name: JELLYCAT Plush Rabbit, luxurious rabbit, soft and cute long-eared rabbit - 40cm
description:
- PRODUCT: Long-eared Bunny Rabbit, Adorable JellyCat Plush Toy, Grade 1, Safe for Babies
- Colors: Pink, White, Purple, Gradient, Brown, Gray
- By purchasing from us, you will receive the highest quality Grade 1 products at the most competitive prices on the market.

- To keep your plush toys soft, clean, and durable, Mlem Bear would like to introduce you to the proper way to care for your plush toys, specifically as follows:
â?¢ Wash your plush toys regularly: Regularly washing your plush toys will help remove dirt, bacteria, and prevent mold. You can wash your plush toys by hand or in a washing machine. When washing by hand, you should use mild soap and warm water. When washing in a washing machine, you should choose a gentle wash cycle and use a laundry bag to protect your plush toy.
â?¢ Dry stuffed animals in a well-ventilated area: After washing your stuffed animal, you should dry it in a well-ventilated area, avoiding direct sunlight. Direct sunlight can cause the stuffed animal to fade and become stiff.
â?¢ Store stuffed animals in a dry place: Stuffed animals should be stored in a dry place to prevent mold. You can store them in a cupboard, a box, or a sealed bag.
â?¢ Inspect stuffed animals regularly: You should inspect your stuffed animal regularly for tears, holes, or missing stuffing. If you find any tears, holes, or missing stuffing, you should repair or replace them immediately.
â?¢ Keep stuffed animals away from fire: Stuffed animals are made from flammable materials, so you should not expose them to fire.

name: 2300W/3500W Dual-Direction Hot and Cold Hair Dryer, Large Size, Standard Type 1
description:
Multifunctional Hair Dryer with Hot and Cold Air, Fast Drying, High Power, 3 Drying Modes, Salon-Quality Hair Care
?? Ionic hair dryers, or negative ion hair dryers, have a similar design to the hair dryers we commonly use, but in addition to drying hair, they can also generate negative ions to protect and moisturize hair. Negative ions are considered by scientists to be "vitamins in the air." Thanks to their amazing health benefits, negative ion technology is used in many health and beauty care devices.

?? Outstanding features of the 2300W High-Power Dual-Mode Hot and Cold Hair Dryer: Fast Drying, 3 Drying Modes, Styling, Salon-Quality Hair Care, and Duckbill Nozzle
- Mini hair dryer equipped with 1 versatile and easily detachable styling nozzle:
- Ultra-thin nozzle (only 11mm) concentrates airflow for precise drying and styling of specific hair areas.
- Hair protection mode provides optimal drying temperature (maintained at 56-58Â°C) and protects the hair dryer from overheating.
- Ion drying mode creates airflow with negative ions that penetrate deep into the hair, eliminating static electricity, caring for the hair, and flattening the hair cuticles for shiny, frizz-free hair.
- 2 wind speeds to suit your needs.
- When the mini hair dryer operates continuously for too long and the temperature exceeds the manufacturer's specified limit, the machine will automatically shut off to ensure user safety and the machine's durability.
- The mini hair dryer's casing is made of high-quality, glossy plastic, resistant to dirt, and completely insulated.
- The handle of the mini hair dryer also features a convenient hanging hook for easy and neat storage.
- The honeycomb design on the back of the mini hair dryer effectively draws in air, cooling the internal motor and increasing the machine's lifespan.

?? Specifications of the 2300W High-Power Dual-Mode Hot and Cold Hair Dryer with Fast Drying, 3 Drying Modes, Styling, and Salon-Quality Hair Care, Includes Duckbill Nozzle
- Dimensions: 26 * 16 * 7.5cm
- Features: Negative ions and collagen protect and care for hair.
- Voltage: 220 - 240V
- Power: 2300W
- Housing material: ABS plastic
- Cord length: 1m

name: Mini Waterproof Wireless Bluetooth Speaker for Wall Mounting, Bathroom
description:
Mini Waterproof Wireless Bluetooth Speaker for Wall Mounting, Bathroom - Includes Super Cute Sticker Set

Highlights:
- Bluetooth speaker, waterproof, with convenient suction cup base
- Wireless transmission, perfect sound quality
- Designed with a waterproof silicone casing, can be mounted on glass surfaces.
- Can be used in the bathroom, beach, pool, etc., portable anytime, anywhere, convenient for travel.
- The speaker can play music and answer phone calls while connected via Bluetooth, extremely convenient.
- Available in multiple colors.

* Note: Not compatible with devices without Bluetooth.

- Material: Silicone and plastic
- Origin: China
- Size: 10 x 10 cm
- Color: Multiple Colors
- The speaker will come with 1 super cute sticker sheet (random design)

Instructions for use:
- Fully charge the speaker (when the power button turns green, indicating a full battery)
- Press and hold the power button until the green light appears
- Turn on Bluetooth, search for the speaker name BTS - 06 and connect
- Play music, listen and use. The product allows you to adjust the volume.
- When receiving a call, simply press the answer button on your phone to transfer the call to the speaker.

name: Book - My Sweet Orange Tree
description:
PUBLICATION INFORMATION
Author: JosÃ© Mauro de Vasconcelos
Translators: Nguyá»?n BÃ­ch Lan, TÃ´ Yáº¿n Ly
Publisher: Vietnam Writers Association
Number of pages: 244
Dimensions: 14 x 20.5 cm
Release date: December 2020

BOOK INTRODUCTION
â??The bitter taste of poverty blends with the sweetness of discovering what makes life worth living... a classic from Brazil.â?
Booklist
â??A nearly complete view of life from a childâ??s perspectiveâ?¦ powerful enough to warm and break hearts, regardless of age.â?
The National
Get acquainted with ZezÃ©, the most mischievous and adorable boy, who dreams of growing up to be a poet with a bow tie. Not everyone will agree on that â??adorableâ? aspect. Because, in that impoverished suburban neighborhood, the pervasive hardship blinded people to the kind heart and vivid imagination of the five-year-old boy.
What did all the mistreatment and scolding matter, for ZezÃ© had a special friend to confide in: the sweet orange tree in the backyard. And another friend, flesh and blood, appeared one day, teaching the sensitive boy what tenderness and pain truly were, forever changing his life.
Beginning with bright, clear tones and ending with melancholic, nostalgic notes, My Sweet Orange Tree makes us realize that the true beauty of life comes from simple things like the white blossoms of the tree behind the house, and that life is miserable without love and compassion. This classic book has thus continued to stir the hearts of readers worldwide since its first publication in Brazil in 1968.

AUTHOR:
JOSÃ? MAURO DE VASCONCELOS (1920-1984) was a Brazilian writer. Born into a poor family in the suburbs of Rio de Janeiro, he grew up working various jobs to make a living. But with his innate storytelling talent, extraordinary memory, vivid imagination, and rich life experiences, JosÃ© felt compelled to become a writer and began writing at the age of 22. His most famous work is the autobiographical novel *My Sweet Orange Tree*. The book is included in the Brazilian elementary school curriculum, has been sold to twenty countries, and has been adapted into a film. In addition, JosÃ© was also very successful as a film actor and screenwriter.

name: Hada Labo Advanced Nourish Cleanser 80g - Optimal Moisturizing Facial Cleanser
description:
Model Name: Hada Labo Advanced Nourish Cleanser 80g

Main Ingredients and Benefits: Hada Labo moisturizing facial cleanser provides deep cleansing and a deep moisturizing system to keep skin hydrated, bright, smooth, and youthful every day.
- Fine foam gently cleanses away dead skin cells, dirt, and sebum deep within pores.
- The deep moisturizing system with HA, SHA, and Nano HA provides optimal hydration to the epidermal layers, addressing dryness and dullness caused by dehydration, and restoring the skin's elasticity for a consistently moisturized, bright, and smooth complexion.
- HA (Hyaluronic Acid): Hada Labo moisturizing facial cleanser contains 1 gram of HA, capable of retaining millions of water molecules, creating a moisturizing barrier to protect the skin.
- SHA (Super Hyaluronic Acid): Retains twice as much water as HA, gently penetrating and retaining moisture longer in the dermis.
- Nano HA (Nano Hyaluronic Acid): Its extremely small molecular size, only 1/20th that of HA, allows it to easily penetrate the dermis, providing deeper hydration.

Instructions for use:
- After removing makeup, wet your face, put an adequate amount of Hada Labo moisturizing facial cleanser into your palm, and lather.
- Apply the lather evenly to your face and gently massage in the direction of your skin's texture. Rinse thoroughly with water.

* For optimal results, use Hada Labo moisturizing facial cleanser in combination with Hada Labo Advanced Nourish Moisturizing Solution/Cream.

Target users:
- Suitable for all skin types
- Suitable for dry, dehydrated skin
- Suitable for normal skin that feels tight and dry after washing

Brand information:
- Hada Labo brand belongs to Rohto Mentholatum Vietnam
- Brand origin: Japan
- Manufactured in: Vietnam
- Shelf life: 4 years from the date of manufacture
- Manufacturing date: see details on the packaging

*Included gifts & packaging may vary depending on the batch

NOTES WHEN USING SHOP PRODUCTS
- For products with diverse materials, styles, and colors, the best way to preserve them is to sort and wash items of the same color together to maintain the durability and color of the fabric, preventing color bleeding from other clothes.
- For products that can be machine washed, only use the gentle or medium wash setting.
- Turn the garment inside out before drying in a well-ventilated area, avoiding direct sunlight which can easily cause fading. Drying clothes in windy areas will help preserve the fabric color better.
